employmentStatus.description: If employment status value is not in the enum list, use best match e.g. Student map to 'Not in paid employment'

enum: Working tax credit or Universal credit equivalent

requestedLoanAmount.description: the amount the applicant wishes to borrow (min 10000, max 1000000)

requestedLoanTerm.description: the length of time in years for which the applicant wishes to repay the loan for (min 5, max 30)

loanPurpose.description: the purpose of which this applicant requires a loan

numberOfChildDependants.description: number of dependants under 16 years old

residentialStatus.description: If residential status value is not in the enum list, use best match e.g. Private Tenant map to 'Owner Occupier'
